kidozen.client.authentication
Interface IIdentityProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
ADFSWSTrustIdentityProvider, WRAPv09IdentityProvider
public interface IIdentityProvider

Identity Provider interface Implement this interface in order to create customs identity providers Kidozen implements a template method pattern to call the methods in the following order: 1-Initialize 2-BeforeRequestToken 3-RequestToken 4-AfterRequestToken

Version:
1.00, April 2013
Author:
kidozen

Method Summary
 void AfterRequestToken(Object[] params)
          The following method is invoked after the token request to the Identity Provider

          The following method is invoked before the token request to the Identity Provider

          Use it to configure your provider
 void Initialize(String username, String password, String scope)
          Initialization step
 void RequestToken(URI identityProviderUrl, KZAction<String> action)
          This method executes a request to the Identity Provider
